description.value:
Gives +20 to use of Disguise Skill or Disguise Special Use, Best Craftsmanship gives +30. Contains Basic Makeup (+10 to Disguise visually), Prosthetic appliances, Skin Dyes, Vocal Augmenter (+10 to Deceive tests to impersonate voice), and Retina Lenses. Advanced kits may range from makeup and flesh/skin dyes to voice augmenters and gene scanner fooling dermal layering.

Requirements

Kit can be refilled without Requisiton Test as long as having access to appropriate restocking.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
